{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QThe data used in this report were sourced from the [DATASUS](https://datasus.saude.gov.br/) platform, which provides annual population estimates for Brazil by municipality, age, and sex for the period 2000–2024 [@datasusb].\\E$"}
